hero.title: Your next adventure starts here
hero.subtitle: Wake up wherever you want. No rush, no fixed routes, no limits.

intro.title: Freedom has wheels
intro.description: Yabadabadoo Campers was born from a passion: living the road without rushing or fixed destinations. A fully equipped camper so you only have to worry about choosing the next sunset.

camper.title: Meet Yaba
camper.intro: A 2024 Fiat Ducato, fully equipped with everything you need to live the road. Double bed, shower, full kitchen. You just need to pick the destination.

booking.title: Book your adventure
booking.name: Full name
booking.successMessage: We've sent you an email with all the details.
booking.securePaymentInfo: Secure payment guaranteed. No hidden deposits or surprises.

howToBook.question: How do I book the camper?
howToBook.answer: Select your dates on the calendar, fill in your details and make the payment. You'll receive immediate confirmation by email.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept credit/debit cards through Stripe and PayPal.

deposit.question: Is there a deposit?
deposit.answer: Yes, a â‚¬500 deposit is required which is fully refunded after checking the camper's condition.

cancellation.question: What is your cancellation policy?
cancellation.answer: Free cancellation up to 14 days before. Between 7-14 days, 50% refund. Less than 7 days, no refund.

included.question: What's included?
included.answer: Bedding, towels, kitchenware, camping table and chairs, cleaning kit and comprehensive insurance.

pickup.question: Where do I pick up the camper?
pickup.answer: Pick-up and drop-off is at our location. We'll send you the exact address after confirming your booking.
